full_summary:
=====================================

### Cloud-based Learning Management System - Software as a Service

#### Tender Notice Reference Number
                                        
 cb-8703-26001954                                         

#### Solicitation Number
                                        
 1000251924                                                  

#### Notice Type
                                        
 Request for Proposal

#### Tender Category
                                        
 Service Providing

#### Description

Indigenous Services Canada is seeking a contractor to provide a Cloud-based Software as a Service (SaaS) application that meets the requirements for the management, delivery, tracking, reporting, and evaluation of Clinical Practice Guidelines (CPGs) and Clinical Care Pathways (CCPs) along with supporting learning and training materials. The Contractor is expected to provide a solution that can be configured to meet the specific needs of the Government of Canada.

#### Key Requirements

*   The Contractor will be responsible for the delivery of the services from the date of contract award to March 31, 2026, with an option to extend the contract term by up to two (2) additional one-year periods.
*   The successful Contractor will be expected to adhere to the security requirements for this project, as outlined in Part 6 - Security Requirements and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.
*   For more information on personnel and organization security screening or security clauses, please refer to the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the following criteria:
*   Technical Merit: This criterion involves the evaluation of the technical aspects of the proposal. This includes the proposed solution's ability to meet the requirements outlined in the tender notice, as well as the technical skills and expertise demonstrated by the Contractor.
*   Price: This criterion involves the evaluation of the price and fees associated with the proposed solution.

#### Procurement Method

This procurement will be conducted through an open and competitive bidding process.

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
                                        
 The successful Contractor will be expected to provide its services nationally. 

#### Contact Information

*   Name: Christine Madore
*   Email: Christine.Madore@sac-isc.gc.ca
*   Phone: (873) 354-1376
*   Fax: Not available
